title: Chip crunch: how the AI boom is stoking prices of less trendy memory
description: The unexpected ripple effect of the AI boom is giving a much-needed boost to memory chipmakers, including Samsung Electronics, which has lagged rivals in offering advanced AI chips and a rally in their share prices.
content: The global rush by chipmakers to produce AI chips is tightening supply of less glamorous chips used in smartphones, computers and servers, spurring panic buying by some customers and a surge in theirâ€¦ [+5052 chars]

title: US dollar wavers with politics and trade tensions in focus

title: Asian stocks surge as trade tensions ease, Nikkei hits record
